name: Staking
description: Staking, handles staking position interactions and provides staking position details. Gives staking info and allows for liquidity staking.

functionDecorators.name: changeLiquidityAddress
functionDecorators.description: Changes the liquidity address used by the Staking contract. Owner-only.

functionDecorators.name: liquidityAddress
functionDecorators.description: Gets the current liquidity address used by the Staking contract.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The new amount of the staking position.
